sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 295 of 2026, dated 24/Jan/2026, executed by Kuraba Meenamma in favour of her husband, Kuruba Ramesh, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 65.99 Sq. Yds, bearing house number 1-28, Assessment number 196722000028, comprised in survey number 456-2, situated in Karakamukkala Village and Grama Panchayath, Vidapanakallu Mandal, within the District of Anantapur registered at sub-registrar office Uravakonda is bounded as follows: North by: Houses of Kristappa and Prathap South by: House of B Vamsi East by: Balappa Gari Seena House West by: Rastha
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
